name: I'm Beary Sorry
description:
- Salmon is a regular bear, just like the rest of us.

And by that, I mean he never wants to leave his cave, and has lots of unresolved personal baggage/emotional tension that comes crashing down on him when he awakes from hibernation. We've all been there- amirite?

 - Bumble is also a regular bear, also like the rest of us. 

Except she is struggling to handle the fact that immediately prior to hibernation, her best friend of several years, Salmon, asked her out. And she doesn't want to date him.

Uh-oh. Things are about to become a whole lot less regular. Play "I'm Beary Sorry" by Team Bear now, free on itch.io

This game was made in one week for the UC Berkeley College Game Jam. The team was composed of members from UNC Chapel Hill and UNC Greensboro.

From UNC Chapel Hill, the team was composed of Noah MacFarlane, Luke Diasio, Nina Sehgal, Rohaid Bakheet, and  Zac Diasio was from UNC Greensboro.

Songs that were very legally chiptunified: That's the Way of the World by Earth Wind and Fire,  Everything in its Right Place by Radiohead, Ain't No Sunshine by Bill Withers, Where is My Mind by Pixies
